code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import phoneReducer from"../reducers/phone";import PhonesPage from"../reducers/PhonesPage";import PhonePage from"../reducers/PhonePage";import Coupon from"../reducers/Coupon";import{routerReducer}from"react-router-redux";import Basket from"../reducers/Basket";import Profile from"../reducers/Profile";import Categories from"../reducers/Categories";var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;export default(function(){var store=createStore(combineReducers({routing:routerReducer,phone:phoneReducer,PhonesPage:PhonesPage,PhonePage:PhonePage,Basket:Basket,Coupon:Coupon,Categories:Categories,Profile:Profile}),composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk)));return store;});
